name: After-School Program
description: MARIPOSA KIDS offers off-site supervised free play and exploration based after-school programming every SFUSD school day for Leonard Flynn & Dolores Huerta School students. After-School Program includes: ​​ - Screen-free unstructured play time - Art & Crafts projects - Outdoor free play on courts, fields & playgrounds - Guided experiments & games - Sports & outdoor activities - Two healthy snacks each day

howToGetIt: Online Registration for Leonard Flynn School Online Registration for Dolores Huerta School
cost: Financial assistance may be available! This is a fee-based program
